description: Removal of BT kiosk and replacement with 1no. new InLink structure
decision_conditions: The proposed development by virtue of its size and siting would result in a visually intrusive incongruous addition to the streetscene that would compete with existing street furniture and signage creating street clutter and detract from the character and appearance of the area. The proposal would not accord with policies CS8 and DM10 of the Councilâ€™s adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012.
